JobFullDesc: Since 1992, Ciena has been driven by a relentless pursuit of network innovation.  We believe in a network that grows smarter, more agile, and more responsive every day. This means that when you digitally interact in your world - picking up the phone, streaming video, texting a friend or loved one – your interactions are being enabled by Ciena technologies.  Ciena makes your social / entertainment / business existence REAL.What will you do at Ciena?Within Ciena’s Converged Packet Optical family of products we are looking for a candidate with broad Linux and middleware experience to join our team of embedded software development professionals.
